properties.displayName: Service Registry Key Deleted Via Reg.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains " delete " and (FolderPath endswith "reg.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "reg.exe") and ProcessCommandLine contains "\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\services\\"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects execution of "reg.exe" commands with the "delete" flag on services registry key. Often used by attacker to remove AV software services
